Instructions

  1. Select a map to load from the dropdown above.
  2. Select a tile from the Palette.
  3. Click on the grid cells to place the selected tile.
  4. Ensure you have at least one Cat Start (üêà) and required Dog Spawns (üêï).
  5. Click Export Data.
  6. Copy the generated array string from the text area below.
  7. Paste it into the `mazes` array in your `game.js` file (replacing an existing map or adding a new one).
